name: @posthog/hogql-parser
description: WebAssembly HogQL Parser - Parse HogQL queries in JavaScript/TypeScript
author: PostHog Inc.

scripts.build:compile: emmake cmake --build build_wasm --config Release && cmake --install build_wasm
scripts.build:make: emcmake cmake -S . -B build_wasm -DCMAKE_BUILD_TYPE=Release && npm run build:compile || echo 'Warning: hogql-parser build failed, skipping'
scripts.build: emcmake cmake -S . -B build_wasm -G Ninja -DCMAKE_BUILD_TYPE=Release && npm run build:compile || echo 'Warning: hogql-parser build failed, skipping'
